SELECT G.GROOMING_NO, G.GROOMING_TITLE, G.GROOMING_INTRODUCE, G.GROOMING_IMG, G.GROOMING_TYPE , GD.D_DAY, GT.TAG_NAME, G.GROOMING_PARTICIPANTS, GC.GMEMBER_COUNT , G.GROOMING_COUNT FROM GROOMING G JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, TRUNC(GROOMING_END_DATE - SYSDATE) AS D_DAY FROM GROOMING) GD ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GD.GROOMING_NO) JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER) M ON(G.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, (LISTAGG(TAG_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY GROOMING_NO)) AS TAG_NAME FROM GTAG GT JOIN TAG TA ON(GT.TAG_NO = TA.TAG_NO) GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GT ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GT.GROOMING_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS GMEMBER_COUNT FROM GROMMING_MEMBER GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GC ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GC.GROOMING_NO) WHERE G.GROOMING_STATUS = 'Y' AND GD.D_DAY >0
